description:
Description

As day gives way to night, let Treecell Night Collagen Shampoo Midnight Forest transform your hair care routine. This luxurious, gel-textured shampoo goes beyond cleansing, offering a deeply rejuvenating experience.

Infused with powerful ingredients like L-menthol and salicylic acid, Treecell Night Collagen Shampoo effectively removes impurities, clearing away micro dust, sweat, and built-up oil accumulated throughout the day. This deep cleansing action helps restore your scalp's natural balance, leaving it feeling refreshed and soothed.

But the magic doesn't end there. Natural plant extracts like centella, seaweed, and buckwheat work their magic as you sleep, nourishing and replenishing your scalp. Meanwhile, rosemary leaf oil promotes hair growth and helps manage hairfall, while collagen boosts elasticity and strengthens each strand.

The shampoo promotes hair growth and reduces hairfall by 56% after 4 weeks of use, thanks to its clinically proven formula. Formulated without parabens, sulfates, and 20 other potentially irritating chemicals, making it suitable for all hair types and gentle enough for even the most sensitive scalps.

The Treecell Night Collagen Shampoo Midnight Forest is more than just a shampoo, it's a ritual. It's a moment of self-care, a chance to unwind and restore your hair's shine and gloss, and soothe an itchy scalp as you drift off to relaxed sleep. Wake up to a refreshed, revitalized, and healthier-looking hair every morning.

FUNCTION
- Deep cleansing formula to remove micro dust, sweat, and oil
- Scalp calming and cooling effect with natural ingredients that reduce itching and flaking
- Anti-hair loss formula, hairfall decreased 56% after 4 weeks of use
- Relaxing scent to induce comfortable sleep

How To Use

1. Wash hair with warm water.
2. After thoroughly wetting the scalp, apply an appropriate amount evenly to the hair and scalp and massage.
3. Rinse thoroughly with water.

Key Ingredients

- Collagen: to boost hair elasticity and improve hair strength
- L-Menthol, Salicylic Acid: To clear scalp buildup and soothe it
- Plant Extracts: Centella, Seaweed, Buckwheat, Houttuynia and more help nourish scalp
- Rosemary Leaf Oil: To promote hair growth and manage hair fall

reviews.content: I personally really disliked using this - it's a shampoo, yet it somehow got more thicker and harder to scrub with my head on the first wash round I do for each showering. It even made me actively and vigoriously claw my head with my fingernails because of how tough and frustrating it made scrubbing my scalp - which ended up making me lose tonnes of hair as a result. I eventually found out that I have to do 2 rounds of shampoo from another brand before using this one (for the 3rd round) will even remotely spread and clean as well as any typical shampoo brand. Due to the extremely poor experience, I gifted it to my mom who enjoys it (says its just like a normal shampoo, so I guess it was the powdery sweet scent that made her like it). If she hadn't liked it as well, I alone would've given this product a 1 star. It gives me extremely low expectations for any other product of this brand. I don't see any difference with my scalp for the effects it mentioned to have.

description:
Description

Introducing Seasalt Therapy Scalp Scaler: Your Scalp's Rejuvenation Ritual

Unlock the secret to a clean, healthy scalp and luscious locks with Seasalt Therapy Scalp Scaler, meticulously crafted, a trailblazer in cosmeceutical haircare. Imbued with the revitalizing essence of the sea, this scalp scrub offers a transformative experience, blending natural sea ingredients with advanced technology for unparalleled results.

CLEAN & HEALTHY SCALP

Experience the purity of mineral-rich sea salt as it works wonders to cleanse and purify your scalp. Our specialized formula helps eliminate impurities and buildup, promoting stronger, healthier hair from root to tip.

HYDRATE & NOURISH

Indulge your hair and scalp with the restorative power of our Seaweed Complex. This nourishing blend deeply moisturizes and revitalizes damaged, frizzy hair, while soothing dry, itchy scalps for a blissful sensation of relief.

HOW TO USE

Unlock the full potential of Seasalt Therapy Scalp Scaler by following these simple steps:

Apply onto wet scalp and hair.

Gently massage to eliminate impurities and stimulate circulation.

Rinse thoroughly for a refreshed, invigorated scalp.

TIP: For optimal results, use once or twice a week in place of shampoo. Add water during massage to enhance lather and maximize the cleansing experience.

Sustainable & Eco-friendly
We're committed to preserving the beauty of our planet. That's why Seasalt Therapy Scalp Scaler comes packaged in Sustainable & Eco-friendly FSC Packaging, ensuring that you can enjoy luxurious haircare while minimizing your environmental footprint.

Embrace the Beauty Found in the Sea 

It’s a philosophy - a dedication to harnessing the natural treasures of the ocean to unveil your hair's true potential. With Seasalt Therapy Scalp Scaler, embark on a holistic journey toward a healthier, more vibrant scalp and hair. Discover the transformative power of professional cosmeceutical haircare and experience the beauty that lies within the sea.
 
How To Use
Use 2-3 times a week instead of shampoo or when necessary, depending on scalp type. To use, wet hair and scalp thoroughly. Place the tip of the bottle on the scalp and apply product directly on the scalp while sectioning hair. Gently massage and rinse thoroughly. Make sure to place cap back on when finished. Due to the high salt content, the formula may be difficult to squeeze out if not used for an extended period of time. If this happens, close cap and shake lightly before use.

Description

Introducing Damage Therapy Shampoo, your ultimate solution for achieving lustrous, smooth hair that radiates with health and vitality.

SHINE & SMOOTH:


Infused with Marine Collagen and Himalayan Pink Salt, our Damage Therapy Shampoo is specifically formulated to gently cleanse while imparting a dazzling shine to even the most unruly, damaged hair. Say goodbye to frizz and hello to silky smooth locks that exude brilliance.


HYDRATE & NOURISH:


Enriched with a Seaweed Complex, this luxurious shampoo goes beyond cleansing to deeply nourish and hydrate your damaged strands. Experience the transformative power of seaweed as it works to calm frizz and replenish moisture, promoting the long-term health of your hair and preventing split ends.


REPAIR DRY CUTICLES:


Our advanced formula features a potent blend of Protein Complex and Ceramide NP, working in harmony to repair and strengthen damaged hair cuticles. Reveal hair that is not only beautifully smooth but also fortified against future damage, leaving you with hair that looks and feels healthier than ever before.


Eco-Friendly Packaging:


With a commitment to sustainability, our Damage Therapy Shampoo is packaged in a blend of 30% PCR (Post-Consumer Recycled) materials and FSC (Forest Stewardship Council) certified packaging, ensuring a better tomorrow for our planet.


The Beauty Found in the Sea:


We believe in harnessing the power of the sea to unlock the true potential of your hair. As a professional cosmeceutical haircare brand, we combine natural sea ingredients with cutting-edge technology to provide instant improvements and long-term solutions for your hair and scalp. Join us on a journey towards healthier, more beautiful hair with our systematic approach to haircare.

reviews.title: Some by mi
reviews.content:
If you’re looking for a hair care routine that truly supports healthy hair growth, this trio from Some By Mi is a must! I’ve been using the Cica Peptide Anti Hair Loss Shampoo, Scalp Treatment, and Scalp Tonic together, and the results have been amazing.

The Shampoo gently cleanses the scalp without stripping it, while the Treatment deeply nourishes and strengthens the roots. It leaves my scalp feeling calm, soothed, and refreshed. The star for me is the Scalp Tonic — it gives a cooling sensation and helps stimulate circulation for healthier, stronger hair over time.

Using all three products together has made a noticeable difference in reducing hair fall and promoting growth. My scalp feels healthier, and my hair feels stronger and fuller. I highly recommend using them as a set for the best results!
